mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.clear_log_advance_payment_sid, t.pay_bill_sid, t.pay_bill_code, t.vendor_sid, t.vendor_code, t3.short_name AS vendor_name, t.company_sid, t.company_code, t2.short_name AS company_name, t.book_payment_sid, t.book_payment_code, t.book_payment_item_sid, t.shengxiao_status, t.currency_amount_tax, t.remark, t.creator_account, t4.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.data_source_sys, t1.refer_doc_code from s_fin_clear_log_advance_payment t LEFT JOIN s_fin_book_payment_item t1 ON t.book_payment_item_sid = t1.book_payment_item_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t2 ON t.company_sid = t2.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t3 ON t.vendor_sid = t3.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t.creator_account = t4.user_name AND t.client_id = t4.client_id
mapper.select: where t.clear_log_advance_payment_sid = #{clearLogAdvancePaymentSid} ORDER BY t.create_date DESC, t1.refer_doc_code DESC
